contents.text: Welcome to Pivotal in San Francisco, where leading companies build and run their most important applications.
For platform solutions and sales, press 1.
For pricing and licensing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a platform specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to quickly review Pivotal platform pricing and licensing options.
I’d like details on licensing costs and any veteran discounts for your platform.
I need detailed pricing info on enterprise licensing tiers for Pivotal Platform.
I need to review pricing and licensing details for your platform solutions.
I’d like to get details on licensing and pricing options for using your platform in my academic research.

contents.text: For a technical product demo, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a demo engineer.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a technical walkthrough of the Pivotal platform.
I want to schedule a technical demo to see how your platform handles my applications.
I want to schedule a technical demo of Pivotal's container orchestration and microservices features.
I'd like to arrange a simple, guided technical product demo of your software.
I want to schedule a technical demo to see how your platform handles containerized physics simulations.

contents.text: For customer support and services, press 2.
Please stay on the line while our support team retrieves your account information.

navigationGoals: I need immediate troubleshooting support for my Pivotal account issue.
I need help troubleshooting access issues with my account.
I'm encountering a 502 gateway error in my Cloud Foundry deployment and need troubleshooting assistance.
I'm having trouble with my account and need step-by-step troubleshooting support.
I need assistance resolving an error I’m encountering on my trial account.

contents.text: For training resources and workshops, press 2.
One moment please, we are connecting you to our training specialists.

navigationGoals: I’d like details on upcoming training workshops and how to enroll.
I’m looking for training resources or workshops on using your platform.
I’d like to enroll in an advanced Pivotal Platform training workshop on Kubernetes integration.
I want information on beginner-friendly training workshops and resources.
I’m looking for workshops or tutorials to learn how to deploy workloads on your platform.
